ygData.subject: Re: EQ Money
ygData.msgSnippet: Easily.  At fifteen (my lvl too), I can solo any derv I see, but note casters are harder then their con.  Most dervs are blue, but a few are green.  Thugs, the
ygData.messageBody:
Easily. At fifteen (my lvl too), I can solo any derv I see, but note
casters are harder then their con. Most dervs are blue, but a few are
green. Thugs, the toughest Derv, is white.
-----Original Message-----
From: McConnell, Jeff <Jeff.McConnell@...>
To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com' <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 07, 1999 12:42 PM
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] EQ Money


>From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>
>Can a lvl 15 handle the Dervs
>Silvermyst
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: dlippy [SMTP:dlippy@...]
>> Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 11:47 AM
>> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] EQ Money
>>
>> From: "dlippy" <dlippy@...>
>>
>> Northern Ro Dervs are an excellent source of money. I make about 45-50
>> plat
>> a week and I play about 2-3 per day. I know there might be better places
>> and sources, but this has worked for me.
>>
>> Sarex
>> 15th lvl
>> Holy Order of Armageddon
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: McConnell, Jeff <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com' <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
>> Date: Monday, June 07, 1999 8:19 AM
>> Subject: [eqpaladin] EQ Money
>>
>>
>> >From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>> >
>> >
>> >Hello All
>> > I am a 15th lvl High elf Paladin on Cazic-Thule, and I am located in
>> >the Faydwer area. My primary hunting grounds right now are the
>> Aqua-Goblins
>> >(big group only) and Unrest. The problem I am facing is even though I
>> have
>> >all the spells for 15th lvl and I have a majority of metal armor (some
is
>> >still leather) I can't seem to make any real money. I have noticed a
>> great
>> >need for a combine weapon but at my present rate it will take literally
>> >forever. I tend to hunt in groups of 3 or 4 and generally for around 5
>> hours
>> >a day. I guess what I would like to know is, Am I doing something wrong?
>> or
>> >is everyone broke at this lvl? Is there a better spot to hunt? Your
>> >assistance is most appreciated.
>> >
>> >Silvermyst
>> >
>> >------------------------------------------------------------------------
>> >Give back to your community through "Grow to Give."
>> >http://www.onelist.com
>> >Deadline is June 19. See homepage for details.
>> >
>>
